## CGG

```{r}

vars = grep("^CGG", names(gp34), value = TRUE)

table1(
  NA.label = NA.label1,
  formula(paste(
    "~", paste(formulaic::add.backtick(vars), collapse = " + "), 
    "|",
    column_var |> formulaic::add.backtick())),
  # render.continuous = c(.="N", .="Mean (SD)", .="Median [Min,  Max]"),
  data = visit1_cgg_complete)
```
